package.name: AirPopupConnect
package.shortDescription: Adds a connect button to the Airpods (or any other H1-chip device) popup screen!

descriptionlist.description: Only tested on iOS 13, feel free to try it on other iOS versions and report the results to me on Twitter @itsnicho1as.
Adds a connect button to the Airpods (or any other H1-chip device) popup screen!

changelog.change: Added preferences to configure from settings.
Added a new Apple-style with a much nicer connect button.
